hero_para: Personalized internship recommendations that match your skills, location and ambitions ‚Äî powered by an intelligent ranking engine used for the PM Internship Scheme.

about_para: We use machine learning to surface internships that align with your background and growth goals. Transparent ranking, mentor match and placement assistance ‚Äî all in one portal.
card1_para: Best training programs designed to boost your career with real projects. Gain hands-on experience, learn from industry experts, and build a strong portfolio.
card2_para: Learn directly from industry experts who bring real-world knowledge and give you opportunities to work on real-world problems.
card3_para: Get placed into internships with leading companies while you learn and gain valuable experience.
